text: “Mi jɛ awǎ hwebǐnu, ɖó mi ɖò bǔ ɖò Aklunɔ mɛ; un ɖò vivɔ ɖɔ wɛ ɖɔ mi ni jɛ awǎ”!—Filipunu lɛ 4:4
9:40 XÓÐIÐƆ ZINKPONƆ TƆN: Nǔ E Wu Jehovah Nyí “Mawu Awǎjijɛnɔ” É (1 Timɔtée 1:11, nwt)
10:15 XÓMÁÐƆ: Etɛ ka Nɔ Gɔ́ Sò nú Awǎjijɛ?
• Gbɛ̀ E Bɔkun É ɖé Zinzan (Nǔnywɛtɔ́xó 5:11)
• Azɔ̌ E Ðó Nu É Ðé (Nǔnywɛtɔ́xó 4:6; 1 Kɔlɛntinu lɛ 15:58)
11:15 NǓ-SÈ-DÓ-KPLƆ́N-NǓ: ‘Jehovah Na Ye Awǎjijɛ’ (Ɛsidlasi 1:1–6:22; Ajée 1:2-11; 2:3-9; Zakalíi 1:12-16; 2:11-13; 3:1, 2; 4:6a, 6b, 7)
11:45 Nǔ Hwlɛngán Sín Nǔwiwa Jehovah Tɔn lɛ Ni Nɔ Na Awǎjijɛ We (Ðɛhan 9:15; 34:19; 67:2, 3; Ezayíi 12:2)
1:45 XÓMÁÐƆ: Sɔnǔ nú Awǎjijɛ Ðò Xwédo Towe Mɛ
• Asú lɛ Mi, Mi Nɔ J’awǎ Ðó Asì Mitɔn lɛ Wu (Nǔnywɛxó 5:18, 19; 1 Piyɛ́ɛ 3:7)
• Asì lɛ Mi, Mǐ Nɔ J’awǎ Ðó Asú Mitɔn lɛ Wu (Nǔnywɛxó 14:1)
• Mɛjitɔ́ lɛ Mi, Mi Nɔ J’awǎ Ðó Vǐ Mitɔn lɛ Wu (Nǔnywɛxó 23:24, 25)
• Mɛ Winnyawinnya lɛ Mi, Mi Nɔ J’awǎ Ðó Mɛjitɔ́ Mitɔn lɛ Wu (Nǔnywɛxó 23:22)
3:00 XÓMÁÐƆ: Nǔɖiɖó lɛ Nɔ Ðexlɛ́ Ðɔ Jehovah Jló Ðɔ Mǐ Ni J’awǎ
• Agbaza Mǐtɔn E È Bló Ganji É (Mɛsɛ́dó 17:28; Efɛzinu lɛ 4:16)
4:00 “Mɛ E Nɔ Xò Fífá Kan lɛ É Nɔ Ðó Awǎjijɛ”: Etɛwu? (Nǔnywɛxó 12:20, nwt; Jaki 3:13-18; 1 Piyɛ́ɛ 3:10, 11)
4:20 Xɔ́ntɔn Vívɛ́ Zunzun Xá Jehovah Nɔ Na Awǎjijɛ Ðaxó Hugǎn ɔ Mɛ! (Ðɛhan 25:14; Xabakuku 3:17, 18)
4:55 Han 28 kpo Ðɛ Tasuna Tɔn Kpo

SƐ́N E ƉƆ NǓ DÓ ZINZAN TƆN WU LƐ É  |  SƐ́N NǓ E KAN MƐƉESUNƆ LƐ É TƆN LƐ

Tɛn Ɛntɛnɛti tɔn elɔ nɔ zán nǔwlanɖ'ayǐ yɔywɛ lɛ (cookies) dó bló bɔ tɛn Ɛntɛnɛti tɔn ɔ sín azɔ̌wiwa nɔ nyɔ́ d'eji, lobɔ lee a nɔ zán gbɔn é lɔ nɔ nyɔ́ d'eji. Enyi a kpò ɖò tɛn Ɛntɛnɛti tɔn elɔ zán wɛ hǔn, a yí gbè ɖɔ mǐ ni nɔ zán nǔwlanɖ'ayǐ yɔywɛ lɛ nɛ. Bo na dó ɖó mɔjɛmɛ ɖevo lɛ gɔ́ na, alǒ nú a ma yí gbè nú nǔwlanɖ'ayǐ yɔywɛ lɛ zinzan hwenu e a ɖò tɛn Ɛntɛnɛti tɔn elɔ jí é ǎ hǔn, kɛnklɛn kpɔ́n Sɛ́n E Gbɔn Gbɛ̀ ɔ Bǐ Mɛ Dó Nǔwlanɖ’ayǐ Yɔyɔ̌ lɛ kpo Nǔnywɛ Xwitixwiti Sín Nǔ Mɔhun lɛ kpo Zinzan Wu lɛ É mǐtɔn.
‘Mi sɔ́ nyikɔ mímɛ́ tɔn dó xɔ susu. Mɛ e ɖò Jehovah ba wɛ lɛ ni j’awǎ’—Ðɛhan 105:3
9:40 XÓMÁÐƆ: Mɔ Awǎjijɛ Ðò Nǔ Kplɔnkplɔn Mɛ lɛ Bonu Ye Na Huzu Ahwanvu Sín Azɔ̌ ɔ Mɛ: Blǒ Bonu Nǔwukpíkpé Towe lɛ Ni Kpɔ́n Te
• Nǔ Xó Mawu Tɔn Ni Ðè Hlɔnhlɔn E É Ðó É Tɔ́n (Eblée lɛ 4:12)
• Nɔ Zán Nǔjlɛdonǔwu lɛ Dó Kplɔ́n Nǔ Taji lɛ Mɛ (Matie 13:34, 35)
• Nɔ Kplɔ́n Nǔ Mɛ kpo Akpakpa Sɔ́ Mɛ Kpo (Hlɔmanu lɛ 12:11)
• Nɔ Sè Wuvɛ̌ Xá Mɛ (1 Tɛsalonikinu lɛ 2:7, 8)
• Nǔ Xó ɔ Ni Nɔ Byɔ Ayi Mɛ nú Mɛ (Nǔnywɛxó 3:1)
11:00 XÓMÁÐƆ: Mɔ Awǎjijɛ Ðò Nǔ Kplɔnkplɔn Mɛ lɛ Bonu Ye Na Huzu Ahwanvu Sín Azɔ̌ ɔ Mɛ: Yǐ Gbè nú Alɔdó Jehovah Tɔn
• Azɔ̌wanú Dobanúnǔ Tɔn Lɛ (1 Kɔlɛntinu lɛ 3:9, nwt; 2 Timɔtée 3:16, 17)
11:45 BAPTƐM: Lee Baptɛm Towe Na Zɔ́n Bɔ A Na Ðó Awǎjijɛ Hugǎn Gbɔn É (Nǔnywɛxó 11:24; Nǔɖexlɛ́mɛ 4:11)
1:50 Lee Nɔví Mǐtɔn lɛ Ðò Awǎjijɛ Mɔ Wɛ Ðò Nǔ Kplɔnkplɔn Mɛ lɛ Bonu Ye Na Huzu Ahwanvu Sín Azɔ̌ ɔ Mɛ Gbɔn É
2:35 XÓMÁÐƆ: D’alɔ Biblu Kplɔntɔ́ Towe lɛ Bonu . . .
• Ye Ni Nɔ Ðu Nǔɖuɖu Gbigbɔ Tɔn Yeɖesunɔ (Matie 5:3, nwt; Jaan 13:17)
• Ye Ni Nɔ Wá Kplé Lɛ (Ðɛhan 65:5)
• Ye Ni Nɔ Nyi Alɔ nú Gbɛ̌ Nyanya lɛ Didó (Nǔnywɛxó 13:20)
• Ye Ni Nɔ Ðu Ðò Walɔ Kwijikwiji lɛ Jí (Efɛzinu lɛ 4:22-24)
• Ye Ni Sɔnǔ nú Kancica Mɛɖesunɔ Tɔn ɖé Xá Jehovah (1 Jaan 4:8, 19)
3:40 FÍMU: Nɛɛmíi: “Awǎjijɛ Jehovah Tɔn Wɛ Nyí Ahohó Mitɔn”: Akpáxwé 1 (Nɛɛmíi 1:1–6:19)
4:15 Nǔ Kplɔnkplɔn Mɛ lɛ Dìn Bonu Ye Ni Huzu Ahwanvu Na Zɔ́n Bɔ Mǐ Na Lɛ́ Wà Mɔ̌ Ðò Gbɛ̀ Yɔyɔ̌ ɔ Mɛ (Ezayíi 11:9; Mɛsɛ́dó 24:15)
4:50 Han 140 kpo Ðɛ Tasuna Tɔn Kpo

Tɛn Ɛntɛnɛti tɔn elɔ nɔ zán nǔwlanɖ'ayǐ yɔywɛ lɛ (cookies) dó bló bɔ tɛn Ɛntɛnɛti tɔn ɔ sín azɔ̌wiwa nɔ nyɔ́ d'eji, lobɔ lee a nɔ zán gbɔn é lɔ nɔ nyɔ́ d'eji. Enyi a kpò ɖò tɛn Ɛntɛnɛti tɔn elɔ zán wɛ hǔn, a yí gbè ɖɔ mǐ ni nɔ zán nǔwlanɖ'ayǐ yɔywɛ lɛ nɛ. Bo na dó ɖó mɔjɛmɛ ɖevo lɛ gɔ́ na, alǒ nú a ma yí gbè nú nǔwlanɖ'ayǐ yɔywɛ lɛ zinzan hwenu e a ɖò tɛn Ɛntɛnɛti tɔn elɔ jí é ǎ hǔn, kɛnklɛn kpɔ́n Sɛ́n E Gbɔn Gbɛ̀ ɔ Bǐ Mɛ Dó Nǔwlanɖ’ayǐ Yɔyɔ̌ lɛ kpo Nǔnywɛ Xwitixwiti Sín Nǔ Mɔhun lɛ kpo Zinzan Wu lɛ É mǐtɔn.
‘Sɔ́ Jehovah dó ɖó nǔ e víví nú we hú nǔ bǐ é; enɛ ɔ, é na na nǔ e ɖò hǔn mɛ nú we lɛ we’—Ðɛhan 37:4
9:40 XÓMÁÐƆ: Mǐ Sixu Ðó Awǎjijɛ Ðò Ninɔmɛ Elɔ lɛ Mɛ:
11:20 XÓÐIÐƆ JUNJƆN BIBLU JÍ NÚ MƐ BǏ: Jɛ Dɔkun E Ma Nɔ Hɛn Wuvɛ̌ Wá nú Mɛ Ǎ É: Gbɔn Nɛ̌ É? (Nǔnywɛxó 10:22, nwt; 1 Timɔtée 6:9, 10; Nǔɖexlɛ́mɛ 21:3-5)
1:55 FÍMU: Nɛɛmíi: “Awǎjijɛ Jehovah Tɔn Wɛ Nyí Ahohó Mitɔn”: Akpáxwé 2 (Nɛɛmíi 8:1–13:30; Malacíi 1:6–3:18)
2:50 ‘Sɔ́ Jehovah Dó Ðó Nǔ E Víví nú We Hú Nǔ Bǐ É’! (Ðɛhan 16:8, 9, 11; 37:4)
3:50 Han Yɔyɔ̌ kpo Ðɛ Tasuna Tɔn Kpo

SƐ́N E ƉƆ NǓ DÓ ZINZAN TƆN WU LƐ É  |  SƐ́N NǓ E KAN MƐƉESUNƆ LƐ É TƆN LƐ

Tɛn Ɛntɛnɛti tɔn elɔ nɔ zán nǔwlanɖ'ayǐ yɔywɛ lɛ (cookies) dó bló bɔ tɛn Ɛntɛnɛti tɔn ɔ sín azɔ̌wiwa nɔ nyɔ́ d'eji, lobɔ lee a nɔ zán gbɔn é lɔ nɔ nyɔ́ d'eji. Enyi a kpò ɖò tɛn Ɛntɛnɛti tɔn elɔ zán wɛ hǔn, a yí gbè ɖɔ mǐ ni nɔ zán nǔwlanɖ'ayǐ yɔywɛ lɛ nɛ. Bo na dó ɖó mɔjɛmɛ ɖevo lɛ gɔ́ na, alǒ nú a ma yí gbè nú nǔwlanɖ'ayǐ yɔywɛ lɛ zinzan hwenu e a ɖò tɛn Ɛntɛnɛti tɔn elɔ jí é ǎ hǔn, kɛnklɛn kpɔ́n Sɛ́n E Gbɔn Gbɛ̀ ɔ Bǐ Mɛ Dó Nǔwlanɖ’ayǐ Yɔyɔ̌ lɛ kpo Nǔnywɛ Xwitixwiti Sín Nǔ Mɔhun lɛ kpo Zinzan Wu lɛ É mǐtɔn.
Nǔflínmɛ ɖé lɛ nú Kpléɖókpɔ́watɔ́ Lɛ
AJIJIMƐNÚ LƐ XƆSA Kɛnklɛn hɛn dó ayi mɛ ɖɔ ajijimɛ sín nǔ lɛ kɛɖɛ wu wɛ azɔ̌xɔsa enɛ nɔ kpé nukún dó.

AZINKPO LƐ Kɛnklɛn lin mɛ ɖevo lɛ tɔn kpɔ́n. Flín ɖɔ xwédo towe sín hagbɛ̌ lɛ, mɛ e kpo hwi kpo zɔn mɔ̌to ɖokpo ɔ mɛ lɛ é, mɛ e kpo hwi kpo ɖò xwé ɖokpo ɔ gbè lɛ é, alǒ mɛ e a ɖò Biblu kplɔ́n xá wɛ lɛ é kɛɖɛ wɛ a sixu sɔ́ tɛnmɛ ɖ’ayǐ na. Kɛnklɛn bo ma sɔ́ nǔ ɖebǔ ɖó tɛn e a ma sɔ́ ɖ’ayǐ nú mɛ ǎ é mɛ ó.

BAPTƐM Tɛnmɛ e è sɔ́ ɖ’ayǐ nú mɛ e jló na bló baptɛm lɛ é na ɖò atáa ɔ sín nukɔn, afi nú è lɛ́ wá ɖexlɛ́ ɖò alɔkpa ɖevo mɛ ɔ nɛ. Mɛ e jló na bló baptɛm lɛ é ɖó na jinjɔn finɛ cobɔ xóɖiɖɔ baptɛm tɔn ɔ na bɛ́ ɖò Síbígbe zǎnzǎn. Ye mɛ ɖokpo ɖokpo ɖó na hɛn wǔsúnsúnnú kpo nǔ e ye na dó bo bló baptɛm na bɔ é ɖò jlɛ̌ jí é kpo wá.
MƐÐÉE ZÍZÉ JÓ XƆSA Enyi a jló na zé hwiɖée jó bo na ɖ’alɔ ɖò azɔ̌ e kúnkplá tuto kpléɖókpɔ́ ɔ tɔn lɛ é mɛ hǔn, kɛnklɛn yì Azɔ̌xɔsa E Nɔ Ðɔ Nǔ E Ba Wɛ È Ðè lɛ É nú Mɛ É alǒ Mɛɖée Zízé Jó Xɔsa.

NǓ E BÚ BƆ È MƆ LƐ É È ɖó na zé nǔ ɖebǔ e è mɔ é yì Nǔ E Bú Bɔ È Mɔ lɛ É Xɔsa. Enyi a hɛn nǔɖe bú hǔn, yì azɔ̌xɔsa enɛ bo ba kpɔ́n. Enyi a mɔ vǐ ɖé bonu é bú dó mɛjitɔ́ tɔn lɛ bo ɖò flúflú wɛ hǔn, kɛnklɛn kplá ɛ sɔyi azɔ̌xɔsa enɛ. É ɖò mɔ̌ có, kɛnklɛn kpé nukún dó vǐ towe lɛ wu, bo hɛn ye ɖó akpá towe bonu nǔ mɔhun ma wá jɛ ó.

NǓNINA LƐ È zán akwɛ gegě bo dó bló tuto zinkpo e jɛ é tɔn, mɔ gbezeyiaga tɔn tɔn, videoxonú lɛ tɔn, kpo azɔ̌xɔsa gegě ɖevo lɛ tɔn kpo bonu mǐ na dó sixu ɖu vivǐ kpléɖókpɔ́ ɔ tɔn lobo na sɛkpɔ́ Jehovah. Nǔnina towe e a nɔ sɔ́ jlǒ dó na é nɔ d’alɔ bɔ è nɔ kpé akwɛzinzan enɛ lɛ wu, lobo nɔ lɛ́ nɔ gudo nú azɔ̌ e mǐ nɔ wà gbɔn gbɛ̀ ɔ bǐ mɛ é. Bonu é na bɔkun nú we ɔ, è tò gbǎví nǔnina tɔn e è ɖó wuntun lɛ é gbɔn nɔtɛn kpléɖókpɔ́ ɔ tɔn. A sixu zán donate.jw.org dó na nǔ gbɔn Ɛntɛnɛti jí. Nǔnina lɛ bǐ wɛ xɔ akwɛ tawun. Hagbɛ̌ Alixlɛ́mɛtɔ́ ɔ jló na dókú nú we nú lee a nɔ na nǔ dó nɔ gudo nú Axɔ́suɖuto ɔ sín nǔ lɛ gbɔn é.

TƐNMƐNAMƐTƆ́ LƐ È ɖè tɛnmɛnamɛtɔ́ lɛ bonu ye na d’alɔ we. Kɛnklɛn bo ɖó gbè kpɔ́ xá ye, lobo xwedó alixlɛ́mɛ ɖebǔ e ye na na bɔ é na kúnkplá fí e è nɔ gán kɛkɛ lɛ alǒ mɔ̌to lɛ ɖó é, yiyi kpo wiwa kpo ɖò nɔtɛn kpléɖókpɔ́ ɔ tɔn, tɛnmɛ sísɔ́ ɖ’ayǐ nú mɛ, kpo nǔ ɖevo lɛ kpo é.

Wemaxɔmɛ nú Wɛnɖagbejlatɔ́ Axɔ́suɖuto ɔ Tɔn Lɛ Gbexosin-alijitɔ́ ɖěɖee ɖó xwè bɛ́sín 23 jɛ 65 bo jló na vlɔ́n kan nú sinsɛnzɔ́ yetɔn lɛ é hɛn ɔ, ye na wá mɛ e jló na yì Wemaxɔmɛ nú Wɛnɖagbejlatɔ́ Axɔ́suɖuto ɔ tɔn lɛ é sín kplé ɖò Aklunɔzángbe hwemɛ. È na wá ɖɔ gan e mɛ è na bló kplé enɛ é kpo fí e è na bló ɖè é kpo.
Hagbɛ̌ Alixlɛ́mɛtɔ́ Kúnnuɖetɔ́ Jehovah tɔn lɛ tɔn wɛ bló tuto tɔn

“Always rejoice in the Lord. Again I will say, Rejoice!”—Philippians 4:4

11:15 DRAMATIC BIBLE READING: “Jehovah Caused Them to Rejoice” (Ezra 1:1–6:22; Haggai 1:2-11; 2:3-9; Zechariah 1:12-16; 2:7-9; 3:1, 2; 4:6, 7)

ATTENDANTS The attendants are assigned to assist you. Please cooperate fully with them by following their direction with regard to parking, crowd movement, seat saving, and other matters.

BAPTISM Seats for baptism candidates will be reserved on the main floor in front of the stage unless otherwise indicated. Candidates for baptism should be seated there before the baptism discourse begins on Saturday morning. Each one should bring a towel and a modest bathing suit.

DONATIONS At considerable cost, arrangements have been made to provide adequate seating, a sound system, video equipment, and many other services that make attending the convention enjoyable and assist us in drawing closer to Jehovah. Your voluntary contributions help to cover these expenses and also support the worldwide work. For your convenience, clearly marked contribution boxes are located throughout the facility. You may also donate online by visiting donate.jw.org. All donations are very much appreciated. The Governing Body wishes to thank you for your generous support of Kingdom interests.
FIRST AID Please bear in mind that this is for emergencies only.

LOST AND FOUND All unclaimed items should be taken to the Lost and Found Department. If you have lost anything, go to this department and identify your belongings. Children who have strayed from parents and are lost should be taken to this department. However, to avoid needless stress for all involved, please look after your children and keep them with you.

SEATING Please be considerate of others. Remember, you may save seats only for your immediate family members and for those traveling with you in the same vehicle, living with you in the same home, or currently studying the Bible with you. Please do not store things on seats that you are not saving.
VOLUNTEER SERVICE If you wish to assist with the work involved in the convention arrangement, please report to the Information and Volunteer Service Department.

School for Kingdom Evangelizers Pioneers between the ages of 23 and 65 who are interested in expanding their ministry are invited to attend the meeting for applicants for the School for Kingdom Evangelizers on Sunday afternoon. The exact location and time for this meeting will be announced.
Arranged by the Governing Body of Jehovah’s Witnesses
